name: Sundae Driver
description:
This is a cute cat racing game where you have to collect ice cream and deliver it to your destination before it melts. There are three maps in the game. Thanks for taking a look at our game. We hope you enjoy it. :) You can also check out the game here https://elegant-noyce-cc4f39.netlify.com 

Please turn on the sound in the settings for the full experience! :>
